alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 3:40PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Crooked Creek near Central. * WHEN...Until 315 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 323 PM AKDT, The public reported flood water at the doors of the Museum and Store in Central. Additional rainfall of 0.2 to 0.5 inches of rainfall is expected across the warned area. Rapid snowmelt is also occurring and will combine with the rain to cause additional flooding. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near Crooked Creek in Central. Between 1 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.5 inches are possible through Friday morning. - locations along and near Crooked Creek in Central - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
